TEXT: Slay the Spire with these challenging twists!
Draw #b2 fewer cards per turn. NL Lose #b1 Energy at the start of your turn. NL Start with an additional orb slot. NL At the start of combat, channel one of each orb in random order.
Before the start of combat, ALL enemies gain #b1 #yCuriosity.
Map generation will only have two unconnected paths. NL At the start of each Act, refresh your Wing Boots. NL Wing Boots only holds #b2 charges rather than #b3.
LET'S GO GAMBLING!!!! NL At the start of each Act, reroll your cards into others of the same rarity and color. NL Rerolled cards keep their upgrades.
At the start of your turn, gain the effects of #yCombust.
Start with half max HP. NL Before the start of combat, gain the effects of #yFasting.
Complete Act 3 OR NL have at least #b200 Max HP.
At the start of Act 2, obtain a #yRunic #yPyramid.
Complete Act 3 OR NL Remove ALL #yParasites from your deck.
Whenever you play a card, increase its cost by #b1 for the rest of combat.
Shops will only appear once per Act, where the chest normally spawns. NL The first time you spend #yGold at a shop, obtain an #yEctoplasm.
Complete Act 3 OR NL Have at least #b1,500 #yGold.
ALL cards that directly grant Block are removed from the card pool. NL Card rewards have #b1 less card to choose from.
Before the start of combat, lose #b3 #yStrength, gain #b1 #yEnvenom, and gain #b3 #ySadistic.
Start the run with a #ySmoke #yBomb. NL At the start of combat, apply an Emerald Elite buff to ALL enemies.

ALL Ironclad cards are added to the card pool. NL During combat, you cannot play consecutive cards of the same color. NL Draw #b1 additional card per turn. NL Shuffling is changed to draw alternating card colors when possible.

ALL usual methods of Stance-entering have been removed. NL When Happy Flower is at #b1 or #b2, enter Calm. NL When Happy Flower is at #b0, enter Wrath. NL Card rewards have #b1 less card to choose from.
Skip Act 1 entirely. NL Start with #b250 #yGold, #yLiquid #yBronze, and a #yFear #yPotion.
Card reward screens have been replaced by Match and Keep. NL The cards that would be in each card reward are put into Match and Keep, and the other remaining cards are random #rCurses.
Unknown rooms appear more often. NL N'loth will frequently be encountered in unknown rooms. NL You cannot avoid giving relics to N'loth, and N'loth will give you a #yCirclet in return.
Complete Act 3 OR NL Have #b8 #yCirclets at once.
On odd turns, become #yEntangled. NL On even turns, deal double damage.
Before the start of combat, a random enemy gains #yMalleable and a #b25% max HP boost.
Whenever an enemy dies, all other enemies gain #b2 #yStrength.
Start with half max HP. NL When Lizard Tail is used up, obtain a #yTombstone.
Before the start of combat, lose #b3 #yStrength, lose #b3 #yDexterity, and gain #b5 #yVoid.
Whenever an enemy dies, remove all your buffs and gain #b3 #yAntifact.
Whenever The Bomb goes off, #yMine #b3 random #yGems with random sizes. NL #yRare cards in card rewards have a #b50% chance of being replaced by The Bomb.
Grass is present in each combat. NL At the start of your turn, for each unplucked crop, EVERYONE gains #b1 #yPoison.
Before the start of combat, lose #b3 #yStrength.
Before the start of combat, lose #b3 #yStrength. NL At the start of your turn, #ySplit into a random #ySlime. NL Instead of gaining #yStrength when absorbing a #ySlime, gain #ySlimy #yTongue.
Play a run with special rules!
Enable to start the run on Ascension 20
Enable Ascension Level 20 by default in the Curated Challenges screen

A random challenge will be selected for you to play. NL NL Prioritizes challenges that have not been completed. Otherwise, selection is truly random. NL NL #y(Note: #yhovering #yover #ythe #ytrophy #yicon #yin-game #ydisplays #ycurrent #ychallenge #yinfo)
